The office today is no longer a place where people need to be tied to the same workplace with their team. collaboration.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"There are two types of working
